title: (x) Boston Globe newspaper fonts - various Font Bureau fonts {Mark S}
content:
Can anyone ID the Boston Globe fonts - headline, body text, or both? Thanks!

[http://graphics.boston.com/globe/acrobat/today.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025091702/http:/graphics.boston.com/globe/acrobat/today.jpeg "http://graphics.boston.com/globe/acrobat/today.jpeg")
author: copperfont

comments.content:
Miller Display Roman, Miller Global Head (custom), Miller Global Text (custom), Miller Text, Global Logos (custom), Poynter Agate, Poynter Gothic Text, etc.

Just off the top of my head.

(I'm kidding. Source: [Fonts on the Front Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20141025091702/http:/www.ascendercorp.com/Ascender_Corp_Fonts_on_the_Front_Page_11_15_2004.pdf), by Ascender Corporation.)
